title: Fantasy RPG Project
description: A starter template for a fantasy RPG. Includes asset decks for Quests, Items, and Creatures, with pre-built production pipelines using Journeys. This template separates game design (GDD) from production (Work).

decks.name: Core Mechanics
decks.description: Defines fundamental rules: combat, progression, dialogue, etc. These are hero cards, not task cards.

cards.title: Player Stats (STR, DEX, INT)
cards.content:
Defines the primary attributes for the player character.

- **STR (Strength):** Affects melee damage and carry weight.
- **DEX (Dexterity):** Affects ranged damage and chance to dodge.
- **INT (Intelligence):** Affects magic damage and mana pool.

cards.title: Combat System (Turn-Based)
cards.content:
Core spec for the combat loop.

- **System:** Turn-Based, initiative order decided by DEX.
- **Action Points:** Each unit has 4 AP per turn.
- **Actions:** Move (1 AP), Attack (2 AP), Use Skill (2-3 AP), Use Item (1 AP).

cards.title: Dialogue System
cards.content:
Spec for player conversations.

- **System:** Branching dialogue tree.
- **Checks:** Must support stat-based checks (e.g., [INT 10] Persuade).
- **Flags:** Must be able to set and check quest flags.

cards.title: XP & Leveling
cards.content: Defines the player progression curve. Reference 'XP_Curve.csv' (link).

decks.name: Quests
decks.description: The central quest log. Add a new quest as a card, then start its journey to create all production tasks.

cards.title: MQ1: The Dragon's Lair
cards.content:
**Goal:** Player must defeat the dragon in the Burning Peaks.
**Giver:** King Alistair in the capital.
**Steps:**
1. Find the hidden map.
2. Speak to the Hermit.
3. Slay the dragon.

cards.title: MQ2: The Shadow's Heart
cards.content:
**Goal:** Stop the Shadow Cult from completing their dark ritual in the sunken temple.
**Giver:** Varis the Royal Mage, after completing 'MQ1: The Dragon's Lair'.
**Steps:**
1. Find the key to the Sunken Temple.
2. Survive the temple's water traps.
3. Interrupt the ritual by defeating the 3 Cultist Lieutenants.
4. Confront the Cult's leader, Malakor.

cards.title: SQ1: The Lost Miner
cards.content:
**Goal:** Find the miner lost in the Crystal Caves.
**Giver:** Worried Wife in Boulder Town.
**Reward:** 500 Gold, 2x Health Potion.

decks.name: Items
decks.description: Database for all items: weapons, armor, potions, and quest objects. Add an item, then start its journey.

cards.title: Health Potion
cards.content:
**Type:** Consumable
**Effect:** Restores 50 HP over 3 seconds.
**Cost:** 25 Gold

decks.name: Creatures
decks.description: Bestiary of all enemies, monsters, and neutral NPCs. Add a creature, then start its journey.

cards.title: Goblin Skirmisher
cards.content:
**Role:** Weak melee attacker.
**HP:** 30
**Behavior:** Rushes the player in groups. Flees at 10% HP.
**Loot Table:** `LT_Goblin_Common`

cards.title: Shadow Stalker
cards.content:
**Role:** High-damage 'rogue' enemy.
**HP:** 75
**Behavior:** Stays in shadows, attempts to backstab. Applies 'Poison' DoT.
**Loot Table:** `LT_Shadow_Rare`

decks.name: Coding
decks.description: Programming tasks, engine work, and systems implementation.

decks.name: Writing
decks.description: Quest dialogue, item descriptions, and lore.

decks.name: Audio
decks.description: SFX design, music implementation, and audio mixing.

decks.name: QA
decks.description: Central queue for all defects, exploits, and technical issues.
